General.Name: YG-1 Co. Ltd
General.Description: YG-1 Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of cutting tools in South Korea. It offers milling, hole making, threading, and turning tools, as well as tooling systems. The company also exports its products to approximately 75 countries. YG-1 Co., Ltd. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Young-Bae  Lee
1.Title: Chief of R&D Center and Director
